title: Are there going to be a RP sale for this Christmas?
body: We had that every Christmas before right? So is it still a thing for this year? XD

replies.body: I can't recall a period where RP was on sale.  There is the [Snowdown ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/snowdown-crafting-2016)event going on, as well as champion and content sales per the [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page.  Most sales going can also be applied to friends through the gifting center as well.  Hopefully that helps clear some things up!

So...what is happening with the RP sales? WIll they ever happen again?
The increased price of RP was due to the high dollar back in ~2015 - not that I know much of global economics, but it has apparently leveled out since then.

And then there's the "Early sales". Come on, seriously? 1350 RP (~7.40 EUR) NOW or 975 RP (~5.36 EUR) in 6 months? You know damn well the majority ain't gonna wait 6 months to save ~2 EUR. 2 EUR times ~12 million is a helluva lot of money. Better bring back the usual promotional sales again.
